physics.physicsengine



class PhysicsEngine: monitor.monitorable.Monitorable;
Handles collision detection and physics simulation.

Physics is processed on PhysicsBodies which contain state like mass, velocity and collision volume.

this(SpatialManager!(PhysicsBody) spatial_manager);
Construct the PhysicsEngine.

Params:
SpatialManager!(PhysicsBody) spatial_manager Spatial manager to use for coarse collision detection.

void die();
Destroy this PhysicsEngine.

void update(real time_step);
Run the physics simulation of a single frame.
